title: Apple tart 'Maman Blanc'
description: A simple tart topped with buttery soft apples, cream and calvados - takes no time to make, but is so delicious.
ingredients: 125g/4oz unsalted butter, diced, at room temperature
3-4 Cox's Orange Pippin, Worcester, Russet or Braeburn apples, peeled, cores removed, each cut into 10 segments
